definition: apart from/other than/except for/external/outside of/on the other side of/beyond
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]

sentences.english: It must not express that the drawee will perform his promise by any other means than the payment of money.
sentences.chinese: 不得书明付款人将用付款以外之方法履行承诺。

sentences.english: Fourth, the failure is beyond the unit's will.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行为未达既遂是由于单位意志以外的原因。

sentences.english: At the same time, Christians in waiting for an opportunity outside Granada.
sentences.chinese: 而与此同时，基督徒在格拉纳达以外等待时机。

sentences.english: More scientific papers come out of China than out of any other country but the U.
sentences.chinese: 中国的科学论文产出数量高于除美国以外的任何国家。

sentences.english: After the US, no other country has so many people in this list.
sentences.chinese: 除了美国以外，没有其它国家有如此多的富豪入围。

sentences.english: No man but a blockhead ever wrote except for money.
sentences.chinese: 除非是傻瓜，从未有人为金钱以外的东西写文章。

sentences.english: Overtraining can cause other problems besides missed periods.
sentences.chinese: 过度训练能导致停经以外的其他问题。

sentences.english: In addition to cutaways, we also explain physics.
sentences.chinese: 除了拍摄剖面图以外，我们也解释物理学。

sentences.english: Hell, in the past few years you’ve been all but killed about a million times.
sentences.chinese: 该死，在过去的几年里你除了虚度光阴以外一事无成。

sentences.english: It requires a lot more than just being good at your job.
sentences.chinese: 那就需要在做好自己本职工作以外付出多得多的努力。

sentences.english: Marguerite had never been seen with any flowers but camellias.
sentences.chinese: 除了茶花以外，从来没有人看见过她还带过别的花。

sentences.english: I live on all the continents of the world except Antarctica.
sentences.chinese: 我住在世界上除南极洲以外的所有的陆地上。

sentences.english: Outside of Beaujolais this variety hasn't been very successful but it is cultivated in the Loire Valley and California.
sentences.chinese: 薄酒来区以外只有罗亚尔河谷与加州种植较为成功。

sentences.english: The communication mechanism in this paper can be extended to other communication mechanism besides serial devices in VxWorks.
sentences.chinese: 本文的方案可以推广到串行设备以外的其它通信机制。

sentences.english: Oper outside of the parameters specified in the Electricing Characteristics section is not implied.
sentences.chinese: 建议不要事务在电特性表划定的参数界限以外。

sentences.english: He had nothing to do but boil the kettle and make the tea.
sentences.chinese: 他除了烧开水和沏茶以外无事可做。

definition: to get rid of/to remove/to exclude/to eliminate/to wipe out/to divide/except/not including
apart from this/in addition to this
other/the others/else/other than it/in addition to the thing mentioned above
besides/except/to get rid of (sb)/(math.) to divide
to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
